amendment.description: Amendment expresses the support of Congress for the bipartisan July 2000 goals, objectives, and recommendations of the Governors of Idaho, Montana, Oregon, and Washington to protect and restore salmon and other aquatic species to sustainable and harvestable levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section expressing a sense of the Congress regarding bipartisan July 2000 goals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Otter amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
